/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. Cars are parked neatly along the sides of the street, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the background, casting long shadows and bathing everything in a soft, golden light. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
